title: Meley Meley Lyrics Idhu Kadhirvelan Kadhal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Meley Meley
Singers: Karthik
Movie: Idhu Kathirvelan Kadhal
Music: Harrish Jeyaraj
Lyrics: Thamarai
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Meley Mele thannaley
enna kondu ponaley
andha pulla kannaaley
nenja allitaaley

Aala thinnu poraley
aattam poda vachaley
andharthil ennathaan
paththa vachitaley.

Ava dhooram ninna thooralu
en pakkam vandha saaralu
avalaale naan aanen eesalu.

Ava meley romba aavalu
adhanaaley ulle modhalu
ava ennoda kadhal anjalu

Va raasa raasa
valiyellaam rosa rosa
hey lesa lesa
aagaadhey neeyum loosea loosa.

Ava oru azhagiya koduma
adha pulambida pulambida aruva
nedham enna paarthadhum
aeri pochu peruma.

Ava oru vagaiyila inima
adha arinjida arinjida pudhuma
enana thottupesida koodi
pochu therama.

Ava nerula vandha podhum
thervellaam thaeradi aagum
ava kannaale pesum dheebam
(Meley Mele..)

Kadavula thuthipavan iruppaan
konda kadamaya madhippavan iruppan
ada avala paarthida
ellaathayum marappaan.

Ulagaththa rasippavan iruppan
endha unavayum rusippavan iruppan
ava kooda ninnavan
thanna thaanaey edappaan.

Ava oru mura vacha kaaram
en usurula niththam oorum
ava theeraadha neer aagaaram. (2)
